text:
How can I output LLVM IR from a Julia file? I tried:
```path-to-executable/julia --compile=yes --output-bc file.bc --sysimage path-to-sys-ji/sys.ji -- path-to-julia-file/file.jl```
But I’m getting:
```ERROR: LoadError: ArgumentError: Package Distributed not found in current path:
- Run `import Pkg; Pkg.add("Distributed")` to install the Distributed package.```
Note that I’m building Julia locally (running `make`  on a clean clone of version `v1.5.3` from the Git repo), and that there is a `using Distributed` in `file.jl`.
